attributes.action: call a general election at the point when the sitting prime minister resigns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when mr blair resigns i believe the decent thing to do would be to call a general election as many of the population voted for him to lead the country and not his croney gordon brown .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
